title: Overnight Health Care: Global coronavirus cases top 1M | Cities across country in danger of becoming new hotspots | Trump to recommend certain Americans wear masks | Record 6.6M file jobless claims

content:
Welcome to Thursday's Overnight health care.
There are now more than 1 million confirmed cases of COVID-19 worldwide, according to Johns Hopkins University. There are 236,339 confirmed cases in the U.S., including more than 5,600 deaths. And a record 6.6 mil… [+16357 chars]
